title: Silicon Valley Bank's struggles spell further trouble for beleaguered tech startup market
description: Silicon Valley Bank's crisis is due to the challenges faced by its clients, though the problems could now get worse.

title: Shares of SVB Financial fall more than 50% as tech-focused bank looks to raise more cash
description: Trading in the stock was halted for volatility multiple times during the session after SVB announced plans to raise more than $2 billion of new capital.

title: Disney CEO Bob Iger says it's time for 'newness' from Marvel movies
description: "Do you need a third and a fourth for instance? Or is it time to turn to other characters?" Iger said of Disney's Marvel strategy.

title: A look inside a $22.5 million Miami condo with insane luxury amenities
description: The touted amenities span over 70,000 square feet and 300 acres and include everything from a giant waterpark to a $1.2 million beachfront cabana.

title: Biden budget would cut deficit by $3 trillion over next decade with 25% minimum tax on richest Americans
description: Biden proposes to impose a minimum tax of 25% on the rich, hike taxes on oil and gas companies and raise the corporate tax rate from 21% to 28%.

title: In just a few minutes this week, Powell changed everything on market's view of interest rates
description: The central bank leader set out a new paradigm for how the Fed views its policy path.

title: Women aren't investing at the same rate as men. Here's why it matters—and how the gap can be closed
description: The reasons for the gender investing gap are nuanced — but if closed, it could mean an additional $3.22 trillion in the market.

title: GM offers buyouts to 'majority' of U.S. salaried workers
description: GM expects to take a pretax charge of up to $1.5 billion related to the buyouts, according to a public filing Thursday by the company.

title: 29-year-old travel nurse seized a chance to make $187,000 and only work 9 months a year: It's 'a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity'
description: In 2020, hospitals were in desperate need of nurses. Aspen Tucker, then a staff nurse, saw the switch to travel nursing as a life-changing opportunity.

title: Apple announces new classical music app that launches on March 28
description: Apple Music Classical will launch on March 28 and will boast five million unique tracks.

title: All travelers to the UK — including from the EU and U.S. — will need pre-authorization by 2025
description: All tavelers who currently do not require a visa to visit the U.K. will need to apply for digital pre-approval before arriving by the end of 2024.

title: Is the U.S. falling behind China in Africa’s lithium industry?
description: CNBC explores Zimbabwe’s mining sector to find out why China has a stronghold on the country and why it matters to the U.S.

title: 'Our phones are ringing off the hook': Amid a global downturn, the finance world is chasing Middle Eastern money
description: The Gulf region's 10 largest sovereign wealth funds combined manage nearly $4 trillion, according to the Sovereign Wealth Fund Institute.

title: The U.S. imposed semiconductor export controls on China. Now a key EU nation is set to follow suit
description: The Netherlands — home to critical chip firm ASML — is embroiled in political tensions between the U.S. and China over semiconductor technology.

title: Credit Suisse to delay its 2022 annual report after a 'late call' from the SEC
description: Credit Suisse announced that it will delay the publication of its 2022 annual report after a late call with the SEC on Wednesday night.

title: Meet the woman who wrote a shocking account of her life on Wall Street
description: Jamie Fiore Higgins, who worked at Goldman Sachs for 18 years, wants to break the "taboo" around candidly discussing workplace harassment and assault.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Everyone's anxious about Friday's jobs report
description: Two jobs reports released yesterday showed the labor market remaining stubbornly robust. But layoffs rose and wage growth decelerated.

title: Women make up only 20% of Asia's boardrooms, but Japan and South Korea lag even further behind
description: Asia is falling far behind its regional peers in terms of female boardroom representation, analysis from MSCI and BofA Securities showed.

title: Eli Lilly Alzheimer's treatment solanezumab failed to slow disease progression
description: Solanezumab's failure is a blow to efforts to treat Alzheimer's in people who have not yet shown clinical symptoms.

title: U.S. says it doesn't want to separate its economy from China's
description: The U.S. is pushing back on the idea it wants to suppress China, according to a State Department spokesperson's comments.

title: They moved abroad hoping to save money — here’s what they found out
description: Many people move abroad hoping to reduce their cost of living. Like home, it often depends on where and how you live.

title: This fish farmer-turned-entrepreneur runs a profitable start-up. Here are his tips
description: The founder of eFishery says businesses should focus on making money from day one and not burn cash unnecessarily.
